thread.title: Health and Community Services Union wants Ballarat hospital to face bullying, harassment probe
thread.title_full: Health and Community Services Union wants Ballarat hospital to face bullying, harassment probe - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Health and Community Services Union wants Ballarat hospital to face bullying, harassment probe
text: One of Victoria's peak health unions has called on the state's auditor-general to investigate Ballarat hospital, amid claims it is fostering a culture of bullying and harassment. ...
